page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF JASON 1
page.content: I get up by my watch alarm which I set at half past seven.I come down stairs and have my breakfast.I eat a cereal called shreddies.After I get dressed and wash and clean my teeth,I go to call for my friend.Some times I meet him by the lane.We walk up to school.We usually get to school at about five to nine.School starts at nine fifteen so until then we stay out in the play ground.When we go in we have a service.Afterwards we do diary but that is only on Monday.Otherwise we do Maths.,English,Sheets or Reading.On Monday we go to Neyland Pool for Swimming lessons. We go for dinner at twelve o'clock in the Village Hall.We go home at three thirty.
